item.title: My Chemical Romance
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Emo is for bands that talk about their feelings, you dumb fucking bitches.

My Chemical Romance doesn’t talk about wanting to kill themselves, feeling so sad they’re going to die, etc. They just sing songs that are a little violent.

It’s no worse that Seether or any bands like them. Get a life.

item.title: My Chemical Romance
item.dc:creator: @fezz fezz
item.description:
@fezz wrote:

[quote=“Painless, post:21, topic:25753”]Hate em ^^
They are emo… Wanna know why?
Cause Wikipidia says:

emo has often been used to describe such bands as AFI, Alexisonfire, Brand New, Coheed and Cambria, Fall Out Boy, From First to Last, Funeral for a Friend, Hawthorne Heights, My Chemical Romance, Panic! at the Disco, Senses Fail, Something Corporate, The Starting Line, Story of the Year, Taking Back Sunday, Thursday, The Used, and Underoath.

And you can’t argue with Wikipedia.[/quote]

lol wikipedia sucks…

i only like 1 song of my chemical romance, thats the black parade

Read full topic

item.title: My Chemical Romance
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Slayerexpert:

Ghost of You and stuff is OK, kinda mediocre, but seriously that song Black Parade SUCKS!!! Like some sucky goth crap. It bugs me so much. When I see that singer with that short white hair, he looks like some emo woman or something. My eyes bleed when I see their music videos.

Aye, just like a gay guy to judge other guys based on their looks.

@Painless, I don’t believe Fall Out Boy or Panic! At tHe Disco are emo. Why does MCR have to be?

emo has often been used to describe such bands as AFI, Alexisonfire, Brand New, Coheed and Cambria, Fall Out Boy, From First to Last, Funeral for a Friend, Hawthorne Heights, My Chemical Romance, Panic! at the Disco, Senses Fail, Something Corporate, The Starting Line, Story of the Year, Taking Back Sunday, Thursday, The Used, and Underoath.

item.title: My Chemical Romance
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Actually, MCR are one of the more talented no-talent pop bands in my opinion. The guitarist seems to be able to actually move his fingers, for example, instead of leaving them permanently in the fifth position.

Not my cup of tea however, me being over 14…

PS. How could you think “mama” on the new album is dark? I could see the first album being considered dark… but “mama” has a fucking swingy sort of italian sounding beat ffs…

Read full topic

Not Emo.

i was kinda upset with this album thought becasue in their last two they were a little more dakrer you might say and now they are all spunky and crap…

They’re darker on this album. Listen to “Mama”.

I just had mad doggie sex with my dad and uncle, I think im going back for more.

How’d joo no silly?[/quote]

  2. Dark… Lets all lol for a second!
